title: Bro why tf doesn't rr campus have 16A sockets anywhere
content:
Roaming around the fricking campus like a dog trying to search for a 16A socket to charge my fricking gaming laptop. 

EC campus has so many 16A sockets.

comments.body: Get an adaptor bro it's only 100 rupees
suck my dick and ill give you a doggy style 16 A sockets

The first difference i felt coming from ec campus to rr was the classrooms (atleast f block) didnt have plugs in the walls all across 
Got cucked day 1
Tf even in the fancy blocks?
Funny cause in EC campus my mobile charger simply refuses to fit in those 16A sockets.
Have to stick pen and risk electrocuting yourself to get it charged. Worth it üëç
What bout in the new NB hostel , do they have 16A wall outlets in the rooms ?
